title: Another day
creator_credit: Zanthus Films, Jennie Blackwood and Anti Cancer Council
brief_description: Views of a number of people who have suffered from cancer leading normal happy lives. Stresses the importance of seeking medical advice and aid at the first suspicion that one has contracted the disease.
